# Income Lab - Retirement Income Planning Software

---

**Website:** https://incomelaboratory.com/  
**Category:** Retirement Income Planning & Client Engagement  
**Description:** Income Lab provides award-winning retirement income planning software for financial advisors, including Life Hub (interactive one-page planning), Tax Lab, Retirement GPS, and Social Security Optimizer.

---

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Monthly Price | Annual Price | Per User Basis | Notes |
|------|---------------|--------------|----------------|-------|
| **Monthly Plan** | $189/month | N/A | Per license | After first month ($20) |
| **Annual Plan** | N/A | $1,850/year ($154.16/month) | Per license | Save 10% annually |
| **Single Advisor** | N/A | $1,717.20/year | Per seat | Single user license |
| **Small Team (2-9)** | N/A | $1,609.20/year | Per seat | Volume pricing |
| **Large Team (10+)** | N/A | $1,501.20/year | Per seat | Highest volume discount |
| **Support Staff** | N/A | 50% of advisor price | Per seat | Para-planners, assistants |
| **Enterprise** | Contact Us | Contact Us | Custom | Tailored solutions |

### Pricing Notes
- **First Month Special:** $20 for the first month, then $189/month standard
- **Annual Discount:** Save 10% with annual billing ($1,541.60/year)
- **Support Staff:** 50% off advisor price for non-advisor staff
- **Payment:** Monthly or annual billing
- **License Type:** Per seat (individual use)
- **Refund Policy:** Contact for details
- **Available To:** Financial professionals only

---

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities
- **Life Hub:** Interactive one-page financial planning view
- **Tax Lab:** Tax-smart distribution planning and Roth conversion analysis
- **Retirement GPS:** Turn-by-turn retirement income planning directions
- **Social Security Optimizer:** Optimized Social Security claiming strategies
- **Dynamic Longevity Planning:** Probability-based longevity risk assessment
- **Retirement Stress Test:** Historical stress testing (Great Depression, 2008, etc.)
- **Economic Context Capabilities:** Market scenario modeling
- **Report Center:** Customizable reporting
- **Automated Plan Monitoring:** Alerts and updates
- **Annuity Planning:** Comprehensive annuity analysis
- **Account Aggregation:** Integrations for data aggregation
- **Client Portal:** Interactive client-facing portal
- **One-Page Plan Reporting:** Simplified plan delivery

### Advanced Features
- **Visual Financial Planning:** Client-friendly visualizations
- **Withdrawal Sourcing:** Down-to-account-level sourcing
- **Timeline with Milestones:** Visual timeline of financial events
- **Multiple Tax Strategies:** Roth conversions, tax bracket management
- **Scenario Planning & Comparisons:** Side-by-side scenario analysis
- **"Quick Create" Option:** Fast plan builds for simple cases
- **Custom 1-Page Reporting:** Branded, simplified reports
- **Adjustment-Based Planning:** Dynamic plan adjustments

### Enterprise-Only Features
- **White-Glove Onboarding:** Dedicated implementation support
- **Advanced Organizational Controls:** Firm-wide compliance controls
- **Custom Solutions:** Tailored to organizational needs
- **Volume Discounts:** Based on seat count
- **Dedicated Support:** Priority support for enterprise

### Limitations
- **Financial Professionals Only:** Not available to retail investors
- **Monthly PDF Limits:** Not explicitly stated (likely tier-based)
- **Seat-Based Licensing:** Per user, not shareable
- **Primarily Retirement Focus:** Not a full portfolio analytics platform
- **Add-Ons:** Some features may be tier-specific

---

## Add-On Products & Services

### Support Staff License
**What it does:** Provides platform access to para-planners, operations staff, assistants
**Key Features:** Same features as advisor, but no advisor registration required
**Pricing:** 50% of advisor price per seat
**Use Cases:** Support staff who need platform access but don't provide advice

---

## Integration Overview

**Total Integrations:** 10+ partners (custodians, technology platforms)

Income Lab integrates with major custodians and technology platforms to enable account aggregation and reduce duplicate data entry.

### Key Integrations (7 Detailed)

#### 1. Riskalyze (Risk Analysis)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Integrates Riskalyze risk tolerance data into Income Lab planning
- **Data synced:** Risk scores, client profiles
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (OAuth connection)
- **Limitations:** Riskalyze subscription required
- **Documentation:** https://incomelaboratory.com/

#### 2. Redtail (CRM)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** One-way (Income Lab ‚Üê Redtail)
- **What it does:** Connects with Redtail CRM for client data and account aggregation
- **Data synced:** Client contact information, account data
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (OAuth connection)
- **Limitations:** Redtail subscription required
- **Documentation:** https://incomelaboratory.com/

#### 3. Charles Schwab (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Automatic account aggregation from Schwab accounts
- **Data synced:** Account balances, holdings, transactions
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (Schwab institutional relationship needed)
- **Limitations:** Schwab advisor services account required
- **Documentation:** https://incomelaboratory.com/

#### 4. TD Ameritrade Institutional (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Integration with TD Ameritrade's institutional platform
- **Data synced:** Account data, holdings, performance
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (TD Ameritrade institutional relationship)
- **Limitations:** TD Ameritrade institutional account required
- **Documentation:** https://incomelaboratory.com/

#### 5. Fidelity (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Integration with Fidelity's advisor platform
- **Data synced:** Account balances, holdings, transaction history
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (Fidelity institutional relationship)
- **Limitations:** Fidelity institutional account required
- **Documentation:** https://incomelaboratory.com/

#### 6. Altruist (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Modern custodian integration for RIAs
- **Data synced:** Account data, holdings, positions
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (via Altruist platform)
- **Limitations:** Altruist custodian account required
- **Documentation:** https://incomelaboratory.com/

#### 7. eMoney Advisor (Financial Planning)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Integration with eMoney's financial planning platform
- **Data synced:** Financial plan data, account aggregation
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (eMoney subscription required)
- **Limitations:** eMoney subscription required
- **Documentation:** https://incomelaboratory.com/

### Other Partners & Integrations
- **Custodians:** Pershing, TradePMR
- **Technology:** Orion, Black Diamond, Advyzon
- **Financial Planning:** MoneyGuide, Right Capital
- **Portfolio Management:** Wealthbox, Blueleaf

---

## Integration Types Available

- **Native/Embedded:** Direct integration via Income Lab platform
- **API-Based:** RESTful API connections for data sync
- **Account Aggregation:** Automatic balance and holdings updates
- **Data Link:** Real-time synchronization
- **OAuth:** Standard authentication for most integrations

## API & Developer Info

### API Availability
- **Public API:** Yes - Income Lab provides API access for integrations
- **Documentation:** Available through support channels
- **Authentication:** OAuth 2.0 for primary integrations

### Rate Limits
- Not publicly documented
- Professional support recommended for high-volume use

### Authentication Methods
- OAuth 2.0 for most integrations
- API tokens for custom integrations (enterprise tier)

### Developer Portal
- Available for enterprise customers
- Contact sales for access: https://incomelaboratory.com/contact-us/

### Public Documentation Assessment
- **Quality:** Good - knowledge base and support available
- **Limitations:** Some details require direct contact with Income Lab
- **API Docs:** Available for enterprise customers

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros (5+ items)
1. **Award-Winning Platform:** Recognized as #1 Retirement Distribution Planning Tool (2024 T3 Survey)
2. **Interactive One-Page Planning:** Life Hub provides visually engaging client presentations
3. **Tax-Smart Distribution Planning:** Advanced Roth conversion and tax strategy analysis
4. **Historical Stress Testing:** Tests plans against major market events (1929, 2008, etc.)
5. **Social Security Optimization:** Advanced claiming strategy analysis
6. **Adjustment-Based Planning:** Dynamic plan updates based on client circumstances
7. **Affordable Entry Point:** $20 first month, $189/month thereafter
8. **Support Staff Pricing:** 50% discount for non-advisor staff
9. **Strong Integrations:** Works with major custodians and planning platforms
10. **Client Portal:** Interactive client-facing interface for collaboration

### Cons (4+ items)
1. **Financial Professionals Only:** Not available to retail investors
2. **Primarily Retirement Focus:** Not a comprehensive portfolio analytics platform
3. **Seat-Based Licensing:** Per user, not shareable between advisors
4. **Pricing Complexity:** Multiple tiers with annual vs monthly differences
5. **Enterprise Pricing Opaque:** Custom pricing requires direct contact
6. **Limited to Retirement Planning:** Less suitable for full portfolio management needs

### Alternatives (with brief comparisons)
1. **MoneyGuidePro:** More established financial planning software, likely more expensive
2. **Right Capital:** Similar retirement focus, different pricing model
3. **eMoney Advisor:** More comprehensive financial planning, higher price point
4. **Kwanti:** Portfolio analytics focus, less retirement planning (see Kwanti profile)
5. **Nitrogen:** Broader client acquisition and engagement platform (see Nitrogen profile)

### Use Cases: "Ideal For"
- **Retirement-Focused Advisors:** Specialized retirement income planning tools
- **Solo Advisors:** Affordable $189/month entry point
- **Small RIAs (2-9 users):** Volume pricing available
- **Advisors with Tax Planning Needs:** Advanced Roth conversion analysis
- **Client Engagement Focus:** Interactive planning and portal features
- **Advisors Using Major Custodians:** Schwab, TD Ameritrade, Fidelity integration

### Use Cases: "Not Ideal For"
- **Portfolio Analytics Needs:** Kwanti or Nitrogen may be better suited
- **Client Acquisition Focus:** Nitrogen has stronger acquisition tools
- **Full Portfolio Management:** Need Orion, Advyzon, or similar
- **Non-Retirement Planning:** Other tools better for comprehensive planning
- **Retail Investors:** Platform designed for financial professionals only

### Key Differentiators (5 items)
1. **Life Hub Innovation:** Interactive one-page planning visualization is unique in the market
2. **Historical Stress Testing:** Tests plans against 90+ years of market history
3. **Adjustment-Based Planning:** Dynamic plan updates based on real-world changes
4. **Tax-Smart Distribution:** Advanced Roth conversion and tax strategy optimization
5. **Social Security Optimizer:** Comprehensive claiming strategy analysis

## Research Methodology Notes

### Sources Accessed
1. **Income Lab Official Website:** https://incomelaboratory.com/ (main features)
2. **Pricing Page:** https://incomelaboratory.com/pricing/ (detailed pricing)
3. **Life Hub Page:** https://incomelaboratory.com/lifehub/ (product details)
4. **Business Wire Announcements:** 2024 Life Hub launch announcement
5. **WealthManagement.com:** Industry publication coverage
6. **Bogleheads Forum:** User feedback and reviews
7. **InvestmentNews:** Altruist integration announcement

### Limitations Encountered
- **Support Portal:** Limited public documentation; contact-based support
- **Enterprise Pricing:** Custom pricing requires direct contact with sales
- **API Documentation:** Not publicly accessible
- **Contract Terms:** Not publicly available

### Recommended Next Steps
1. **Enterprise Inquiry:** Contact sales for custom pricing if firm has 10+ users
2. **Trial Evaluation:** Request demo to test with real client data
3. **Integration Testing:** Connect with primary custodian (Schwab, Fidelity, etc.)
4. **Team Training:** Evaluate onboarding and training options
5. **Comparison:** Test against MoneyGuidePro and Right Capital for retirement planning needs

### New Vendors Discovered from Research
- **Kwanti:** Already processed (portfolio analytics platform)
- **Nitrogen:** Added to queue (risk analysis platform - see Nitrogen profile)
- **Betterment for Advisors:** Already in queue (custodian)
- **Altruist:** Already in queue (custodian)
- **Advyzon:** Already in queue (portfolio management)
- **Orion:** Already in queue (portfolio accounting)
